LanguageData.FWrd.Name: Fire Warden (by Pelador)
LanguageData.FWrd.EquippingDone: Fire Wardens will attempt to equip fire fighting tools if they do not have one
LanguageData.FWrd.ReturnToStock: Return equipped fire fighting tools to colony stock
LanguageData.FWrd.ReturnToSpot: In all cases returned equipment goes to the defined return spot (Returning needs to be set)
LanguageData.FWrd.SearchRange: Radius of cells a Fire Warden searches for fire fighting equipment: (25 - 75)
LanguageData.FWrd.SearchRangeTip: Default value is [50], note only valid if equipping is set.
LanguageData.FWrd.ShowEqWarnMsgs: Show warning messages for lack of relevant equipment (when not equipping)
LanguageData.FWrd.ReplacePct: Percentage foam level to replace Fire Extinguisher: [Default 25]:
LanguageData.FWrd.SendReplaceMsgs: Show replacement messages when Fire Extinguishers run out of foam:
LanguageData.FWrd.HandleAnyway: Fire Wardens (with an extinguisher) respond even if a fire is being handled by a FW (with an extinguisher)
LanguageData.FWrd.HandledRange: Radius around a "responder" (Fire Warden with extinguisher) a fire is considered handled: (1 - 15)
LanguageData.FWrd.HandledRangeTip: Default value is [5], note irrelevant if FWs respond even if considered handled. (A "responder" is recognised as having an extinguisher).
LanguageData.FWrd.TooBrave: Fire Wardens neglet their safety (perform acts of bravery)
LanguageData.FWrd.TooBraveTip: Warning!: Fire Wardens will prioritise their alloted fire to extinguish, temporarily ignoring other potential fires en-route.
LanguageData.FWrd.HowClose: Percentage of Extinguisher range to attempt to tackle fires: (50 - 100):
LanguageData.FWrd.BrawlerNotOK: Exclude Brawlers from using Fire Extinguishers (Avoids use of ranged)
